strapiPost.title: Best Friends Animal Society Hosting Pup Crawl In Downtown Rogers
strapiPost.content:
If you've been looking for an excuse to take your dog out on the town, Best Friends Animal Society is hosting its first-ever Pup Crawl in Downtown Rogers on Sept 24th.

  • Pubcrawl with purpose: The event will raise funds for the upcoming construction of the Best Friends Pet Resource Center, an innovative pet shelter that will transform the way homeless pets are cared for and set a nationwide example for the future of animal sheltering.
  • Dogtown: The Pup Crawl will begin at the Frisco Plaza this Saturday at 3p visiting various businesses and bars until 7p. Please limit to one dog per human.

Register for the Pup Crawl HERE.
